data.name: NoMatchingMx
data.value: None of the MX hosts listed in your policy file match the hosts found in your DNS MX records.

data.name: NoMatchingMxMarkdown
SomeMatchingMx
data.value: Not all of the MX hosts listed in your policy file match the hosts found in your DNS MX records

data.name: SomeMatchingMxMarkdown
TestingSomeError
data.value: One or more of your mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy does not meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate.

data.name: TestingSomeErrorMarkdown
data.value: One or more of your mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy does not meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate. Fix this before moving to enforce.

data.name: TestingNoneError
data.value: None of your mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate.

data.name: TestingNoneErrorMarkdown
data.value: None of your mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate. Do not change your policy to enforce mode otherwise emails will be lost.

data.name: EnforceSomeError
data.value: One of your mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy does not meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate.

data.name: EnforceSomeErrorMarkdown
data.value: One of your mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy does not meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate. You should fix this as soon as possible.

data.name: EnforceNoneError
data.value: You will be losing incoming emails: None of the mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate.

data.name: EnforceNoneErrorMarkdown
data.value: You will be losing incoming emails: None of the mail servers listed in your MTA-STS policy meet the minimum standard by supporting TLS 1.2 and presenting a valid certificate. If the problem can't be solved quickly, consider changing your policy back to testing.

data.name: GoToEnforce
data.value: You are ready to change your policy to "enforce".

data.name: GoToEnforceMarkdown
data.value: You have a correctly configured MTA-STS policy and all mail servers listed are presenting good certificates and support TLS 1.2. You are ready to change your policy to "enforce" in order to protect inbound emails.
